mapper.sql: user_id, tel, qq_number, account_name, account_no, address, password, openId, role, create_time, update_time, is_del
mapper.insert:
insert into pg_user
user_id,
tel,
qq_number,
account_name,
account_no,
address,
password,
openId,
role,
create_time,
update_time,
is_del,

mapper.update:
update pg_user
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qq_number = #{qqNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account_name = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account_no = #{accountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
openId = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
role = #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update pg_user set tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq_number = #{qqNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_name = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_no = #{accountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, openId = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role = #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from pg_user where openId = #{openId} and is_del = 0 limit 1
